alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 31 at 6:32PM MDT until further notice by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of south central Idaho and southwest Idaho, including the following counties, in south central Idaho, Gooding and Twin Falls. In southwest Idaho, Elmore and Owyhee. * WHEN...Until 730 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1up to an inch is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gooding, Glenns Ferry, Hagerman, Bliss, White Arrow Hot Spring, Twentymile Butte, King Hill and Deadman Flat. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
